## Installation

You can install the released version of FijiNFMSCalculations from [CRAN](https://CRAN.R-project.org) with:

``` r
install.packages("FijiNFMSCalculations")
```

## Example

This is a basic example:

```{r example}
library(FijiNFMSCalculations)
## basic example code
```
